statements: SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE claim_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM anomalies WHERE claim_type = 'medical' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_amount FROM anomalies WHERE claim_amount > 1000 AND claim_type = 'car';
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM anomalies WHERE claim_amount < 500 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, claim_type FROM anomalies WHERE claim_amount < 5000 ORDER BY claim_type ASC
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_type FROM anomalies WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount, claim_type FROM anomalies WHERE claim_type = 'Medical'
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE claim_date > '2021-12-31' AND claim_amount < 2000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'Data Error';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claim_data WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT anomaly_description FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_id = 1001;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claim_data ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM claim_data WHERE policy_number LIKE 'X-%';
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'Data Entry' ORDER BY anomaly_id DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claim_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY anomaly_id ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM claim_data WHERE policy_number = 'POL123' ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'Fraud' AND anomaly_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY anomaly_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000
SELECT claimant_name, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT c.claimant_name, ci.item_description FROM Claims c JOIN Claim_Items ci ON c.claim_id = ci.claim_id
SELECT cp.payment_amount, cp.payment_date FROM Claim_Payments cp ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT c.claimant_name, ci.item_description, cp.payment_amount FROM Claims c JOIN Claim_Items ci ON c.claim_id = ci.claim_id JOIN Claim_Payments cp ON c.claim_id = cp.claim_id
SELECT claimant_name, claim_amount, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Claim_Items WHERE item_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY item_amount ASC
SELECT claimant_name, claim_date, item_description FROM Claims JOIN Claim_Items ON Claims.claim_id = Claim_Items.claim_id WHERE claim_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT claimant_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Claims JOIN Claim_Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Claim_Payments.claim_id WHERE payment_amount < 2000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT claimant_name, claim_amount, payment_amount FROM Claims JOIN Claim_Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Claim_Payments.claim_id WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM anomalies;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM anomalies WHERE claim_type='Medical';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM anomalies ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address, claimant_phone FROM claimants WHERE claimant_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM anomalies WHERE claim_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address, claimant_phone FROM claimants WHERE LENGTH(claimant_address) > 50;
SELECT payments.*, claimant_name FROM payments JOIN claimants ON payments.claim_id = claimants.claimant_id;
SELECT * FROM anomalies_log WHERE log_date <= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_claim_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM anomaly_claim_data WHERE policy_type = 'Car';
SELECT insured_name, claim_amount FROM anomaly_claim_data WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM claim_payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, status_description, status_date FROM claim_status WHERE status_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM anomaly_claim_data ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM anomaly_claim_data WHERE claim_amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM claim_payments WHERE payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT claim_id, MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment_amount FROM claim_payments GROUP BY claim_id;
SELECT claim_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM claim_transactions GROUP BY claim_id HAVING num_transactions > 2;
